FindingName: No Conditional Access Policies Block Risky Sign-in
Description: No Conditional Access Policies were found that block users with a sign-in risk of medium of higher. This configuration attempts to determine if the sign-in is being attempted by anyone other than the legitimate user. When not configured, sign-in events that would indicate compromise (impossible travel, etc.) are permitted.
Remediation: Create or modify Conditional Access Policies to include defined sign-in risk values. An example configuration: Navigate to Entra ID/Microsoft Entra → Navigate to Conditional Access (Security → Conditional Access in Entra ID/Protect & Secure → Conditional Access in Microsoft Entra) → Select '+ New Policy' → Select Users → 'All Users' → Select 'Cloud apps or actions' → Select 'All cloud apps' → Select 'Conditions' → Select 'Sign-in risk' → Select 'Yes' to configure → Select desired risk configurations → Select 'Grant Controls' → Select 'Block access' → Change the 'Enable policy' value to 'On' → Select 'Create'.
